channel.title: How can i add the google search bar to my site?
channel.description:
hay every one i just wander how i can add the google search bar to my site im coding in html (im new to it so please explain!!) one other thing i wanted to get my site "online" i have a free domane rite now with www.freehostia.com just so i can learn how to get my site online so you get 2 folders when i use total commander to connect to the ftp i think one being my username.freehostia.com and the other one domane.freehostis.com wich one do i use and do i just save my pages of code in there? lets say i have one page and its called hello.html so i transfer it to the folder now what is the url to that page is it mydomane.freehostia.com/hello or just mydomane.freehostia.com? if it isnt mydomane.freehostia.com then how can i get it to just be that?
ok i think thats it thanks!
edit one last thing how can i get scrolling text that comes across your page?

item.title: How can i add the google search bar to my site?
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

sadly im just using it for a personal home page so i can quickly select my favrate sites[br][size=1]Posted at: December 06, 2006, 11:01:09 AM[/size][hr]im also having a problem by ive got a table running down the left side of my site and cant have anything in the middle now?

Maybe?[/quote]

nope[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 05:27:52 PM[/size][hr]oh ok thanks is can i just have vew source and copy and paste it??[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 05:28:52 PM[/size][hr]i need to go get something to eat so ill be on after school tomorrow hopefully with a answer thanks

ps look at this you mite need it some day http://www.google.com/codesearch
